reviewText: Not formatted for American DVD players. I ordered 2 of these and neither works. Bummed, my granddaughter was excited and now let down.

this turn out great. the story adventures are interesting.the point of view to change there destinies to fallow there owne path not their prewritten storys.love the beautiful outfits. i just wish the bonus features did not have the beginning with apples and ravens day.
I ordered this for my grand daughter for Christmas, when she tried to watch it, it wouldn't play. The error message said we were in the wrong region. Who knew that was a thing.
